relatedBlades.title: Modernizing security for the AI era
relatedBlades.subtitle: Get the playbook for securing people, data, and applications.
relatedBlades.copy:
AI is reshaping the business landscape at a pace few security architectures can match. Organizations who struggle to keep pace with the latest developments risk data breaches, compliance failures, reputational damage, and even obsolescence.

__"Modernizing Security for the AI Era"__ provides a three-pillar playbook to help security leaders tackle this new reality.

You'll learn:

- __Five imperatives for safeguarding employee AI use__, including unsanctioned GenAI tools
- __Three requirements to protect AI-enabled apps__, whether your models are homegrown or integrated via third-party AI tools
- __Five strategies to defend against AI-powered attacks__ such as highly targeted phishing and social engineering scams
- __Benefits of consolidating AI security end-to-end__ across people, apps, and data

Fill out the form to get your free copy and start building a security strategy fit for the AI era.

![Modernizing security for the AI era - image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/7hLV2z2j6tO8DB7rC1f0LX/e66d8a31c4f45602a6c5f239fae50bbb/modernizing_security_for_the_ai_era.png)
